# Byblos

𒁺𒆷 GIN.LA #Gubla גבל 𐤂𐤁𐤋 GBL Gebal جُبَيْل Jubayl

Gubla < Gubna

𓎡 𓃀 𓈖 𓈉 | (locality) Byblos | Kaban / Tifne 𓎡 𓃀 𓈖 𓏏 𓊛 | (seagoing) ship | kabanit > shiphonit shipboat 𓂓 𓏤 𓃀 𓈖 𓌙 | (locality) Byblos | Kabana / KaFTaN ~ KFT:Crete! / QaPuTes ⇔ kaputt? ⇔ 'phtenoi 𐁇𐀜 ⇔ Copten!? 𓊶 𓈖 𓏮 𓈉 | (locality) Byblos | Qabana™ ⇔avanti! <> 𓊶 𓊪 | cover |

𓎡 𓃀 𓈖 𓈉 Kavnan > Canaan see Kur-Phoenician 𓃀 𓈖 𓈉

<?> 𓂓 𓏤 𓆓 𓈖 𓂾 𓂻 | charioteer | kar-𓏤-jotner / Kutschener +++

𐤅𐤍𐤇𐤕 𐤟 𐤕𐤁𐤓𐤇 𐤟 𐤏𐤋 𐤟 𐤂𐤁𐤋 wnḥt 𐤟 tbrḥ 𐤟 ʿl 𐤟 gbl and peace shall depart from Byblos
